meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a zebra.
meanings.sent1: The zebraic pattern on the rug added a wild touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a zebraic design on the wall, mimicking nature's stripes.
meanings.sent3: The zebraic curtains made the room feel like a safari adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her zebraic outfit stood out in the crowd, drawing attention to her unique style.
meanings.sent5: The zebraic stripes on the car hood made it easy to spot in the parking lot.

meanings.definition: Characterized by stripes like those of a zebra.
meanings.sent1: The zebraic umbrella shielded her from the sun with its striped canopy.
meanings.sent2: The zebraic road sign warned drivers of the upcoming sharp turn.
meanings.sent3: His zebraic socks peeked out from under his pants, adding a fun twist to his outfit.
meanings.sent4: The zebraic barcode on the product made it easy for the cashier to scan.
meanings.sent5: The zebraic shadows cast by the trees created a mesmerizing pattern on the ground.
